page.title: 17WOOD DEALERS AT MARKS TEY
page.content: {C.F ANDERSON AND SON}are dealers in wood and sheet materials (like plywood,soft board,insulation board) They import materials from all over the world including Australia, W.G, Brazil,Canada,Ireland,America, Scandinavia,Malaysia and even Russia. Apart from supplying builders etc they make garden furniture,have a mill to make individual mouldings and can treat timber{(with preservative)}in a special vacuum machine.The wood includes mahogony,which is the most expensive,Californian redwood,cedar, Douglas fir and parana pine.They hold {Â£3 million}worth of materials in stock.They handle{75000}tonnes a year. The factory covers 14 acres.They have their own fire engine and store{ {140,000}gallons of water in big tanks. 6 men are trained as firemen.44 men work there and 4 women,8 are local.
